thread.title: Slippery floor ends Warriors’ exhibition against Lakers early
thread.title_full: Slippery floor ends Warriors’ exhibition against Lakers early - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Bruce Jenkins
title: Slippery floor ends Warriors’ exhibition against Lakers early
text:
Photo: Lenny Ignelzi, AP Golden State Warriors forward Draymond Green drives against Los Angeles Lakers center Roy Hibbert and Jordan Clarkson in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in San Diego. Golden State Warriors forward Draymond Green drives against Los...
SAN DIEGO — It’s a tired old relic of a building, dressed up with a new name but still the San Diego Sports Arena in essence. The NBA left here long ago, and people visit the Valley View Casino Arena for concerts, conventions and minor-league hockey. For Luke and Bill Walton, Saturday night was a poignant, almost inconceivable confluence of the past and present. Golden State Warriors forward Draymond Green drives against Los Angeles Lakers center Roy Hibbert and Jordan Clarkson in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in San Diego.
